description: Medical advice topic associated with the MyChart message conversation.

columns.name: THREAD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MED_ADV_TOPIC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains the category value of the medical advice topic that was selected for this conversation. Note that not all medical advice messages may have this data.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TOPIC_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: Contains the name of the topic that was presented to the user when the conversation was created.
